prompts: Create a robot-like Pokemon with a solid blue body and strong arms.
I want a Pokemon that is a mix between a ghost and an ancient guardian.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that combines technology with ancient mythology.
Make a rock-type Pokemon that resembles a humanoid warrior with mystical features.
Imagine a Pokemon with a bulky frame and glowing symbols on its body.
Design a Pokemon that embodies strength and history, standing tall and proud.
Give me a steel-type Pokemon that looks like it was built for battle.
